# Sample Excel file for testing

# This file demonstrates the expected structure for Money Manager Pro exports

This file would contain sample data with columns:

- Period (date)
- Accounts (account name)
- Category
- Subcategory
- Note
- Amount / INR
- Income/Expense (Exp., Income, Transfer-In, Transfer-Out)
- Currency

For testing purposes, you can create a test Excel file with the following structure:

| Period     | Accounts | Category  | Subcategory | Note            | Amount / INR | Income/Expense | Currency |
| ---------- | -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------------- | ------------ | -------------- | -------- |
| 2024-01-15 | Cash     | Food      | Groceries   | Weekly shopping | 1500.00      | Exp.           | INR      |
| 2024-01-16 | Bank     | Salary    | -           | January salary  | 50000.00     | Income         | INR      |
| 2024-01-17 | Cash     | Transport | Fuel        | Petrol          | 2000.00      | Exp.           | INR      |
